message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think it's worth a lot to you, but I'm willing to start with a price of $180. What do you think?
Thank you for offering me the product. I appreciate the value you place on it, but I believe I can find it elsewhere for a lower price. I am willing to pay $140 for the product.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $140. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $160, which is still a great value for this product. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I still believe there is room for a better price. I am willing to pay $150 for the product, which is closer to what I think it's worth.

I understand you're close to your target, but I'm not willing to go as low as $150. I'm willing to make one more concession and meet you at $165. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
